segments.text: It's wonderful to be in the mountains after a hustle bustle week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Indeed . I love the smell of the grass and trees . They certainly refresh my mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can we stop here for a while ? My backpack is very heavy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Did you hear anything ? Look ! An eagle is hovering in the sky .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . It's not an eagle . I think it's a vulture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . Let's walk by the stream . I am sure we can find the waterfall on the map .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I have a good pair of hiking boots . It should not be a big problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also brought a bottle of water and some provisions . If you are hungry , you can let me know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are kind . Look there is a big tree over there , it looks like a thousand-year-old tree .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it is a birch tree.It is not as old as you think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because its trunk is not thick enough to be like a thousand-year-old tree .
segments.speaker: S1
